document_data.name: Wallace
document_data.mainbody: '''Wallace''' was a merchant who sold his wares in the marketplace of [[Trademeet]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: While he was an honest man, Wallace's judgement in business matters was not always the best. He had pale skin and dark brown hair.
document_data.Activities: Among his wares were various projectiles, some scant weaponry, and ''[[potion]]s'', including ''[[potions of love]]''.
document_data.Relationships: Wallace was good friends with [[Mazzy Fentan]], her sister [[Pala Fentan|Pala]], and the rest of the [[Fentan]] family, having known them for decades.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1368}}, Wallace started doing business with a new supplier, [[Barl]]. Unbeknownst to Wallace, Barl was a worshiper of the deity [[Talona]]. This resulted in [[Danno Fairfoot]] purchasing of a [[poison]]ed ''potion of love'' for his  betrothedt Pala Fentan, which rendered her comatose. Soon after, Mazzy was asked for aid in investigating her sister's condition.
